column4: I love powertop: Power usage (ACPI estimate): 5.8W (10.0 hours)
notice how when you bring windows into this channel the problems never get solved
windows won't exists without (back)doors, for crackers ;)
you installed nvidia-current and you are still getting X on intel :O ?
i don't want to use nvidia, i want to remove nvidia-current
do you get terminal (ALT+CTRL+T) if so remove there
then remove nvidia current and try sudo Xorg -configure and copy the xorg.conf file to /etc/xorg.conf
do sudo Xorg -confugre and copy the file before restarting
i tried, it gave me an error about how xserver was already running
ok now do sudo Xorg -configure and copy that file to /etc/X11/xorg.conf
